name: Black Friday Special
description:
This beautiful Fabric Wreath is handmade from yards of thick luxurious cotton fabric and can be used year round for decoration on your door or inside your house. The ribbon in the photo was added, however, I do have an option to add a bow of your choice.

The finished wreath is 12-13" in diameter

The wreath comes with an attached loop for hanging.

This wreath is a smaller version of the one that was featured in Kate Landers Events baby shower as seen on Layla Grace!

All wreaths are made to order so please allow 3 weeks for production time. Rush orders will be charged a $10 fee.

This wreath can be made in other colors, please email me before purchasing if you are wanting a different color.

name: Hoot Hoot It's an Owl Wreath - 14"
description:
**Limited Edition**

Browns, green, blue, and the cutest little owls you've ever seen come together to decorate your front door year round!

This is a 1 of a kind, ready to ship wreath! Wreath ships out the next business day once payment is complete via USPS Priority Mail.

name: Camo Ribbon Wreath
description:
Camo meets glitter in my newest Ready to Ship ribbon wreath!

Finished size is 12".


All sales are final please contact me if you have a question before you order.

name: Christmas Tree Fabric Wreath
description:
This stunning creamy white Christmas Tree wreath is made from the same high quality fabric of my regular fabric wreath but instead of the normal round wreath everyone has this is attached to a Christmas Tree base!

The wreath is decorated with aqua garland which is removable.

The dimensions are 26" tall by 18" wide. Due to the large size it will be accessed extra shipping fees.


All sales are final please contact me if you have a question before you order.

name: Green and Red Christmas Wreath
description:
This is a one of a kind, ready to ship, fabric wreath in a gorgeous emerald-y green.

The finished diameter is 13" and it is built on a Styrofoam base to relieve some of the weight a straw wreath adds.

The red bow is NOT removable. 

All sales are final please contact me if you have a question before you order.

name: DIY Wreath Kits
description:
Make your own Ribbon Wreath using this pre-assembled kit! If you want to ask me any questions about colors please email me first before purchasing!!

The kit includes everything you need to create your own gorgeous Ribbon Wreath. Yards and yards and even more yards of quality grosgrain ribbon sewn into loops, a satin covered straw wreath form, and instructions.

No need to run from craft store to fabric store to another craft store to find the perfect combination of ribbons, I've already done it for you! 
No need to try to figure out how much of each ribbon you need to buy - it's already been calculated using my plethora of Ribbon Wreath making experience!
No sewing machine, no problem - I've already cut and sewn all the loops together for you!

All you need is a hot** glue gun! The satin covered wreath form is ready and waiting for you in the box!

Please note that all wreath kits are custom made and take approximately 2 weeks to complete before they are shipped to you.

**please be careful when using a HOT glue gun, burns can happen and I can not be held responsible**

name: 16" Aqua & Turquoise Wreath
description:
I am beyond obsessed with all things aqua & turquoise for my house (just as mu husband). I couldn't help but make this wreath out of all the aqua ribbons that I've been collecting.

All of my wreaths are handmade in my pet-free, smoke-free home using yards upon yards up YARDS of high quality grosgrain ribbon. The wreath does not include the Welcome sign or bow but either can be added.

This is a READY TO SHIP 16" wreath with a completed diameter of around 18 or so inches. A loop of complimentary ribbon is attached for ease of hanging (I use a command hook on my door to hang mine).

All wreaths (unless stated) are MADE TO ORDER. Production time is around 3-4 weeks before shipping. Currently all wreaths are shipped priority mail. 

If you are in need of a rush order please purchase the RUSH ORDER listing separately. 

All sales are final please contact me if you have a question before you order.

name: Luxe Fabric Wreath
description:
This beautiful Fabric Wreath is handmade from yards of thick luxurious quilted cotton and can be used year round for decoration on your door or inside your house. The blue ribbon in the photo was added by Kate Landers for her baby shower, however, I do have an option to add a bow of your choice.

14 inches is the diameter of the wreath before it is finished, it is around 16" once completed.

The wreath comes with an attached loop for hanging.

This wreath was featured in Kate Landers Events baby shower as seen on Layla Grace!

All wreaths are made to order so please allow 3 weeks for production time. Rush orders will be charged a $10 fee.

This wreath can be made in other colors, please email me before purchasing if you are wanting a different color.


1st photo by Liza Voll Photography

options.name: White Fabric w/ Bow & Rush Fee

name: Turquoise and Yellow Wreath
description:
**Limited Edition**

Inspired by the special addition Ball Mason jars that are available right now in the most gorgeous shade of blue, this wreath is sure to bring the warm and sunny feelings of summer to your front door. This wreath is certain to make your front door the envy of the neighborhood. It's instant cheerfulness right out of the box - just hang it on door from the attached ribbon.

The 14" wreath is a 16" diameter when finished and is a bright combination of turquoise, aqua, and yellow. Other combinations available upon request. Leave notes to seller upon check out.

Also available as a kit - you just supply the hot glue and the labor!

All sales are final please contact me if you have a question before you order.

name: Holiday Wreath Kits - 10"
description:
Make your own Holiday Ribbon Wreath using this pre-assembled kit! If you want to ask me any questions about colors please email me first before purchasing!!

Combo 1 - Red & Green
Combo 2 - Red, Green, & Light Blue (photo 3)
Combo 3 - Red, Pink, Green, & Lime Green (shown in 1st photo with trees and chevron ribbons)
Combo 4 - Red & Aqua (photo 2)

The kit includes everything you need to create your own gorgeous Ribbon Wreath. Yards and yards and even more yards of quality grosgrain ribbon sewn into loops, a satin covered straw wreath form, and instructions.

No need to run from craft store to fabric store to another craft store to find the perfect combination of ribbons, I've already done it for you! 
No need to try to figure out how much of each ribbon you need to buy - it's already been calculated using my plethora of Ribbon Wreath making experience!
No sewing machine, no problem - I've already cut and sewn all the loops together for you!

All you need is a hot** glue gun! The satin covered wreath form is ready and waiting for you in the box!

Please note that all wreath kits are custom made and take approximately 2 weeks to complete before they are shipped to you.

**please be careful when using a HOT glue gun, burns can happen and I can not be held responsible**

name: Varsity Wreath - 14"
description:
Custom handmade Varsity Wreath with your school of choice. Finished wreath is around 16-17" in diameter. 
All wreaths take 3-4 weeks for production and ship priority mail.
A rush fee of $10 can be added on if you would like your wreath in 2 weeks.

More examples can be seen on my blog - http://www.sheskindacrafty.com/2012/07/varsity-wreaths-and-tumblers.html

Please leave a note to seller when checking out with the colors you want.

name: Glam-O-Ween Halloween Wreath
description:
Who says that Halloween has to be scary? This Halloween wreath is more spookalicious than spooky. 100% glam!

This is a ready to ship wreath, will ship out within 1 business day of payment. 

Finished wreath is 15-16" and includes a matching ribbon for hanging.

All sales are final.

name: Design Your Own Custom Wreath
description:
Don't see the wreath you need? No problem!! I can create a wreath based on any inspiration or color combination you need. Your finished wreath is certain to make your front door the envy of the neighborhood. It's instant cuteness right out of the box - just hang it on door from the attached ribbon.

The 14" wreath is a 16" diameter when finished and a 10" wreath is around 12" when finished. 

Also available as a kit - you just supply the hot glue and the labor!

name: Varsity Wreath - 10"
description:
Custom, handmade Varsity wreath on a 10" wreath base. Completed wreath is about 12-13" in diameter when completed.

All wreaths take 3-4 weeks for production and ship priority mail.

A rush fee of $10 can be applied if you would like your wreath in 2 weeks.

More team examples can be seen on my blog http://www.sheskindacrafty.com/2012/07/varsity-wreaths-and-tumblers.html

name: Custom Glitter Monogram Centerpiece Sticks
description:
Custom, one-of-a-kind glitter monograms will make your wedding, engagement party, or bridal shower centerpieces really stand apart!  Many colors available and font combinations are endless for a truly special way to personalize your party. 

Monograms are roughly 5x7 when finished, depending on the monogram letters, and attached to a 10" white stick. There is the option to make them double sided, as well. 

Other sizes available as well. Please contact me for details.

All orders are custom cut and non-returnable and take 2 weeks for production prior to shipping. If you would like to upgrade to Priority Shipping (2-3 days, please contact me for a custom invoice).  

Please email me with color and monogram details as soon as possible once your order is placed.



If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me via email at anytime - sheskindacrafty@gmail.com - I will try to reply back to you within 24-48 hours.

name: Hot Pink & Glittery Gold Valentine's Day Wreath
description:
This combination of Hot Pink & a little glittery Gold has love, love, LOVE written all over it!

All of my wreaths are handmade in my pet-free, smoke-free home using yards upon yards up YARDS of high quality grosgrain ribbon. 

This is a READY TO SHIP 10" wreaths which is about 12-13" in diameter completed. A loop of complimentary ribbon is attached for ease of hanging (I use a command hook on my door to hang mine). Once this wreath is sold if you'd like one just like it it will be a made to order custom wreath.

All wreaths (unless stated) are MADE TO ORDER. Production time is around 3-4 weeks before shipping. Currently all wreaths are shipped priority mail. 

If you are in need of a rush order please purchase the RUSH ORDER listing separately.

name: Ribbon Topiary
description:
My ribbon topiaries make wonderful centerpieces, mantel decorations, and party decorations. They are all custom made just for you! 

Topiaries have a finished diameter of about 7-8", a height of around 16", and come "potted" in a metal pail that matches or compliments your topiary. 

Please note that all topiaries are handmade and customized to your specifics and take 3-4 weeks for shipping. If you need your topiary sooner there is a rush fee option that can have your topiaries completed in 2 weeks.

While you are checking out please note your colors or other important information in the instructions to seller box.

Please contact me with any questions you might have if you are uncertain of what to order.

name: Nautical Anchor Wreath
description:
***Limited Edition***

Ahoy! Your nautical party or nursery will finally be complete with this beautiful anchor shaped ribbon wreath. 

This wreath is 18 inches long, around 15 inches at it's widest point, and 4 inches thick. 

This wreath is made to order and takes 3 weeks to be made BEFORE it is shipped out to you. Since they are all custom made this wreath can come in your choice of any colors to match you party or nursery theme. 

If you have any questions please contact me before purchasing.

This is an over-sized item which requires a bit more shipping than my normal wreaths.

name: Halloween Treat Bag
description:
5 3/4" x 7 1/2" Glassine lined white paper bags. Meet FDA requirements for direct food contact. Custom printed directly on the bag and ready to fill with your favorite treats, snacks, presents, & goodies.

Easy to fill, easy to close! You can check out my blog post for more ideas.
http://www.sheskindacrafty.com/2012/10/new-to-shop-giveaway.html

I can also custom design a bag for you to match any party, holiday, or occasion!

Bags are sold in sets of 12. If you need a different amount please contact me so I can set up a custom order for you.
